nodes.bodyText: Maybe we can use the TEST_RESOURCES_DIR in Consts.java and add on top of that ?
done, break the full path into smaller pieces and move the common part into Conts.java

setTestApi() is an optional method. You can define this, if you want access to the TestApi object. As in this case we are not using that, maybe we can skip this and the class member  private TestApi api; ?
Maybe we can change the name to something more indicative of what this is testing ?
Integration tests can become complicated and sometimes it might be good to add doc comments stating what scenarios we are testing and what are the expectations ?
added comments on top to explain what this integ test does
